sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.description: Institutional-grade overview summarizing recommendation, valuation, catalysts, and risks.

sections.title: Business & Operating Model
sections.description: Break down corporate structure, revenue streams, products/services, geographic mix, customer segments, and business model economics.

sections.title: Segment & Geographic Performance
sections.description: Analyze each operating segment with revenue, profit contributions, growth, and competitive positioning by geography.

sections.title: Technology, R&D, and Innovation Pipeline
sections.description: Detail technology stack, R&D strategy, patents, product roadmap, partnerships, and innovation edge.

sections.title: Go-to-Market & Customer Strategy
sections.description: Discuss distribution, sales motion, marketing, customer success, retention, monetization levers, and pricing strategy.

sections.title: Competitive Landscape & Benchmarking
sections.description: Benchmark against principal peers with quantified comparisons, strategic moats, and share dynamics.

sections.title: Financial Statement Deep Dive
sections.description: Provide detailed P&L, balance sheet, and cash flow analysis with historical trends, segment margins, capital structure, and working capital.

sections.title: Forecast & Scenario Modeling
sections.description: Present base, bull, and bear forecasts with underlying assumptions, sensitivity tables, and implications for valuation.

sections.title: Capital Allocation & Balance Sheet Strategy
sections.description: Evaluate cash deployment, M&A, buybacks, dividends, leverage policy, liquidity, and credit profile.

sections.title: ESG, Governance, and Regulatory Outlook
sections.description: Assess environmental, social, governance practices, regulatory risks, compliance landscape, and sustainability metrics.

sections.title: Risk Matrix & Mitigations
sections.description: Build categorized risk matrix covering business, financial, operational, geopolitical, and technology risks with mitigations.

sections.title: Valuation Deep Dive
sections.description: Expand on DCF, relative valuation, precedent transactions, and multiples; include valuation bridges, sensitivities, and peer comparison tables.

sections.title: Catalysts & Investment Timeline
sections.description: Lay out short-, medium-, and long-term catalysts, milestone timeline, monitoring indicators, and potential downside triggers.
